name: KillersOnALoose
description:
Killers on a loose is a horror game for the scream jam, you crash your car near by a camping ground

controls:

WASD to move, shift to run

bottom left is your own inventory which will contains the ammo clips
f to pick up clips, open doors, pick up keys and other fuel
g to drop ammo clips(tho the clips might go through the floor)
1 2 3 to select the clips in your inventory
t to put the clip in position
e to put the clip in or out of the gun
and r to put a bullet in the chamber
right mouse button to aim
left mouse button to fire
h to turn flash light on and off

the game is a bit clitch with some odd AI bugs
and there might not be enough direction and feed back on where your suppose to go
but i will say that when you get the key and the fuel
go back to the parking lot at the start of the game and click f on one of the cars, and then the game will end
